validation_results.test_suite: ROS2 Code Validator - Comprehensive Validation Suite

detailed_issues.title: Non-Compliant Topic Name
detailed_issues.description: Topic name 'bad_topic_name' doesn't follow ROS2 naming conventions (should be snake_case)
detailed_issues.recommendation: Use compliant topic names following ROS2 conventions

detailed_issues.title: Missing QoS Profile
detailed_issues.description: Publisher created without explicit QoS profile, using default which may not be appropriate
detailed_issues.recommendation: Define and use appropriate QoS profiles for publishers and subscribers

detailed_issues.title: Missing QoS Profile for Subscriber
detailed_issues.description: Subscriber created without explicit QoS profile, using default which may not be appropriate
detailed_issues.recommendation: Define and use appropriate QoS profiles for subscribers

detailed_issues.title: Print Statement Instead of Logger
detailed_issues.description: Using print() instead of ROS2 node logger for messaging
detailed_issues.recommendation: Use self.get_logger().info() or other appropriate logging methods

detailed_issues.title: Missing Parameter Declaration
detailed_issues.description: Parameter 'publish_frequency' used without prior declaration using declare_parameter()
detailed_issues.recommendation: Always declare parameters with declare_parameter() before accessing them

detailed_issues.title: Missing or Inadequate File Header
detailed_issues.description: File header lacks proper module documentation and licensing information
detailed_issues.recommendation: Add comprehensive file header with docstring, author, and license

detailed_issues.title: Missing Input Validation
detailed_issues.description: No validation of LaserScan message content before processing
detailed_issues.recommendation: Validate message content before processing to prevent crashes

detailed_issues.title: Potential Runtime Error - Min Function
detailed_issues.description: min() function could crash if msg.ranges is empty or contains invalid values
detailed_issues.recommendation: Validate list contents and handle empty case before calling min()

detailed_issues.title: Missing Input Validation in Service
detailed_issues.description: No validation of request parameters before arithmetic operation
detailed_issues.recommendation: Validate request parameters before processing to prevent errors

detailed_issues.title: Missing Node Cleanup
detailed_issues.description: No node cleanup in main function, potentially causing resource leaks
detailed_issues.recommendation: Always call destroy_node() and rclpy.shutdown() in finally block

detailed_issues.title: Dangerous System Command Execution
detailed_issues.description: Using os.system() with hardcoded dangerous command poses security risk
detailed_issues.recommendation: Never use os.system() with dangerous commands, especially hardcoded ones

detailed_issues.title: Potentially Insecure Shebang
detailed_issues.description: Using /usr/bin/env in shebang could be manipulated in certain environments
detailed_issues.recommendation: Consider using absolute path to Python interpreter for production code

detailed_issues.title: Inefficient Parameter Access
detailed_issues.description: Getting parameter value without caching, causing repeated lookups
detailed_issues.recommendation: Cache parameter values after initial retrieval for better performance

detailed_issues.title: Inappropriate Queue Size
detailed_issues.description: Queue size of 10 may be inappropriate for the use case
detailed_issues.recommendation: Choose appropriate queue size based on message rate and importance

detailed_issues.title: Blocking Main Loop
detailed_issues.description: Using blocking rclpy.spin() without timeout prevents other operations
detailed_issues.recommendation: Use spin_once() with timeout or proper executor configuration

detailed_issues.title: Unnecessary Data Copying
detailed_issues.description: Direct assignment without considering memory implications for large data
detailed_issues.recommendation: Consider memory-efficient processing for large message types

detailed_issues.title: Node Not Destroyed
detailed_issues.description: Node not destroyed, causing resource leaks and improper cleanup
detailed_issues.recommendation: Always call node.destroy_node() to properly clean up resources
detailed_issues.code_snippet: # bad_ros2_node.destroy_node() # This line is commented out

detailed_issues.title: Global State Management
detailed_issues.description: Using global variables can cause resource conflicts in multi-node systems
detailed_issues.recommendation: Use class attributes and proper encapsulation instead of global state

recommendations.title: Remove dangerous system commands
recommendations.description: Remove os.system('rm -rf /tmp') immediately as it poses serious security risk

recommendations.title: Implement proper parameter handling
recommendations.description: Declare all parameters and implement proper validation before access

recommendations.title: Add error handling
recommendations.description: Implement comprehensive error handling throughout the code

recommendations.title: Define QoS profiles
recommendations.description: Create and use appropriate QoS profiles for publishers and subscribers

recommendations.title: Fix resource management
recommendations.description: Implement proper resource cleanup and use context managers
